[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/webpack5-module-minifier-plugin](./webpack5-module-minifier-plugin.md) &gt; [CHUNK_MODULE_TOKEN](./webpack5-module-minifier-plugin.chunk_module_token.md)

## CHUNK_MODULE_TOKEN variable

Token preceding a module id in the emitted asset so the minifier can operate on the Webpack runtime or chunk boilerplate in isolation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
CHUNK_MODULE_TOKEN: '__WEBPACK_CHUNK_MODULE__';
```
